title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: I applied online, A recruiter got back to me and asked to join 1 of their list of webinars. Then i was scheduled for an interview after. Attended in scrubs and got an offer.

title: Cath Lab RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with recruiter and in person interview with manager. Both were very relaxed interviews. Recruiter called me one day after applying. Whole process took less than 2 weeks. Very chill.

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: I submitted a application they contacted me with in a week. Set up a interview with time, date and location. I arrived 15 mins before time I was told to come to the unit and my interview started on time and ended onetime.

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: Just like speed dating. I interviewed with a few people, separately. It was a nice environment. They had entertainment (food and drinks) and presented the hospital as a good working environment.

title: Medical Office Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Grayson, GA) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was rather short, but 3wsy nonetheless. If you know about what the company expects of you and their goals, and able to apply your skills and values with that of the company, your interview will run smoothly.
Interview Questions: Give me a scenario where you had to deal with a challenging task at a previous company and how did you handle it?

title: Executive Director ER Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA)
Interview Descriptions: Through human resources recruiter... Meet with recruiter..weeks to get interview.  Then weeks too get hired after a few shifts of great and meet..then weeks before you start due to training schedules
Interview Questions: How too deal with co workers when having a bad day

title: Nurse Residency Program Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA)
Interview Descriptions: I had an panel interview with 3 people. They were very welcoming and professional at the same time. They did have printed results of the behavior test and had pre-set questions from the results. However, the interviewees just went along with the flow and kept the interview very conversation like. Overall, it was a great experience with amazing people. Very close and family like vibe.
Interview Questions: Experience with negative customer/patient, and how you handled it.

title: Team Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA) in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions: Peer panel, great tour, met the exec team and other directors.  The staff met me on my interview, and each seemed genuinely interested in whether I was a fit to the team.
Interview Questions: Do you believe that a happy employee makes a difference?

title: Unit Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: Quick, straight forward, it was with the director and the charge nurse. Lasted about thirty mins and you get a feel if they are gonna go with you or not ... just be charming
Interview Questions: Same generic questions as most employers.

title: ICU Nurse Interview
Application Type: The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center
Interview Descriptions:
On line application.  Contacted by HCA recruiter via phone and email. Unrushed, low pressure phone conversation/interview with follow up scheduled at main campus HR. Interviewed with Director and Clinical Educator, then spent about 2 hours with a staff nurse to have the opportunity to see the unit, charting system, and ask questions.

Received job offer within 24 hours. 

HR paperwork, drug screen, and Employee Health visit completed in one afternoon.
Interview Questions: How had I handled a difficult co-workers in the past.

title: Staff Nurse Emergency Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Phone call from a recruiter followed by interview face to face same recruiter. Followed by interview with director of unit who mainly sells working here how great it is and how people work there for the people.  This became apparent why the interview was so easy after I started working here

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: The manger I met with is no longer a there but she was super nice. Typical questions. Everyone is really nice. The process took about 4 weeks. I had to pay out of pocket to get my BLS before I was allowed to go to orientation or I could have waited and taken the class for free but then had to wait another month to go to orientation.
Interview Questions: What's your background? Why do you want to work for Eastside? What other experience do you have?

title: Account Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA) in Aug 2012
Interview Descriptions: Brief phone interview. Then a panel board interview of about 45 minutes. Second phone interview and offer made.
Interview Questions: Describe your best day at work.

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: It took 3 months to start work after interview to recieve a job offer. It was a panel interview with dept management and floor nurses. Their Phones were ringing and there were multiple interruptions.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Maintenance Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Eastside Medical Center (Snellville, GA) in Mar 2009
Interview Descriptions: Hardware Technicakl Writing had dried up, and I was out of wark for 1 year and 4 months. I have always done my own electrical, plumbing, mechanical work, auto repair, etc. at home, and my wife worked at East Side for many years and had contacts. Having a 20 year career in hardware technical writing, I qualified for an open position in the Plant Operations Department. Dan Warlick (the director) hired me on the spot.
Interview Questions: I was at the South Campus for almost 10 years when the other mechanic who had been there for 26 years had a terrible stroke and is not able to work now. I had to take care of the building for 4 months by myself. Dan transferred to Nashville, TN, and the NEW director (5 months on the job) would not provide any help. He told me that I was expected to take care of the building by myself. It had been maintained for over 25 years by 2 or more people.
